content:
{A害羞挠头}A fresh start... Doesn't it just feel like there's so much left to discover? Hohoho! I feel the same!
<style=SizeSmall>It's just how I thought it would be, yet somehow, completely different...</style>
info: 月下送礼-莫白_主流程文本II

content: I hope it leaves you with a sky full of stars to light up your nights.
info: 月下送礼-莫白_主流程文本II

content: To mark this day, I put this together in my spare time. I hope you'll accept it...
info: 月下送礼-莫白_主流程文本II

content: We've got plenty of adventures ahead of us. {A想象}But for tonight, hoho! Let's <style=Highlight>head home</style>, sink into our <style=Highlight>beds</style>, and get a good, peaceful night's sleep.
